thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Dollar Extends Last Year’s Slide Into 2018

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Extends Last Year’s Slide Into 2018
text:
The dollar can’t seem to catch a break.
The U.S. currency posted its fifth straight quarterly loss in the first three months of the year, puzzling investors who bet it would benefit from corporations repatriating cash in the wake of tax cuts signed into law late last year.
Many investors now believe uncertainty over U.S. policy, the risks...
